[![](6.6-infinite-life.png)](6.6-infinite-life.nlogo){style="float:left; margin-right:10px; margin-bottom:5px;"} This model demonstrates how the game of life can be implemented on an ‘infinitely extensible’ lattice by only recording the locations of live cells.
